headline: Simon Property Group Announces Retirement of Allan B. Hubbard
summary: Simon速, a real estate investment trust engaged in the ownership of premier shopping, dining, entertainment and mixed-use destinations, announced today that one of its longest tenured Independent Directors, Mr. Allan B. Hubbard, is retiring, effective May 14, 2025, and will not stand for re-election to the Board of Directors of Simon Property Group, Inc. at Simon's速 upcoming Annual Meeting.

headline: If I Could Go Back In Time, Here's The Investing Advice I'd Give My 21-Year-Old Self
summary: Market downturns are normal and offer opportunities to buy assets at discounted prices. See how to build wealth with disciplined investing and simple strategies.
